title: Jonah Goldberg, Stephen Hayes and Monica Alba: The "boos" heard around the world
description: Chuck talks with Jonah Goldberg and Stephen Hayes about their new conservative media company called "The Dispatch" and how they want to slow down the news cycle. Plus, NBC News Road Warrior Monica Alba talks about Pres. Trump being booed at Nationals Park on Sunday.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
